name: INSTITUT IGH, d.d.
nace: Other research and experimental development on natural sciences and engineering
description:
Institut IGH, JSC is one of the leading EU civil engineering company. With a rich history dating back to 1949., IGH has grown into the one of largest company for design, supervision, certification services, testing and research, BIM, consulting services and laboratory services.
Applying the experience accumulated in over 75 years of existence, IGH remains a key role providing expertise, innovation and a wide range of services in the field of construction and research. Our areas of expertise cover a wide market range, including civil and structural engineering, energy industry and sustainable development, maritime engineering, airports, urban and spatial planning, geotechnical and hydraulic engineering.
With our commitment to the development of technological and engineering solutions, we continue to set industry standards & be a key partner in the realization of various infrastructure projects.
Learn more at www.igh.hr
